As mentioned before, Covina is located in Los Angeles County and is thus served by Los Angeles International Airport, Burbank/Bob Hope Airport, and John Wayne International Airport. By car, Covina is easily accessible from I-10 by taking the Citrus Avenue exit and going north.

Covina is served by two bus systems and two major cab companies. The two major bus systems are Foothill Transit and Metro. The major cab companies are AAA Yellow Cab and San Gabriel Valley Yellow Cab.

One main shopping venue for Covina is Downtown Covina, located on Citrus Ave. between San Bernardino Road and Badillo Street. Downtown Covina has a selection of specialty shops, including:

Covina Bookstore: A medium-size independent book retailer. Not as well-stocked as chain retailers, but respectable, nonetheless.
